website_summaries.verdict: Highlights include an accurate cooking temperature, high power, and an app loaded with recipes and tips.
pros: Features an adjustable clamp, and a 360 degree directional pump
Downloadable Chefman Sous Vide app contains recipes, temperature guides, and tips
cons: The machine's beeping is very low, hard to hear
Some buyers said this arrived defective or stopped working fairly quickly

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Unit did not work. Set temperature and pressed start. The button would briefly turn blue as it should (less than 1 second), then it would turn red and emit a steady, irritating tone. Tried different outlets, made sure the water level was correct...never even started.
customer_reviews.author: Bamatexphd

customer_reviews.title: but all I received was a crap broken item that didn’t even work and didn’t come ...
customer_reviews.text: What the hell. I purchased this with my hopes up, but all I received was a crap broken item that didn’t even work and didn’t come with a user manual. It turns on but when I start it, the machine does a high pitched siren noise and doesn’t do anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sous Vide for an amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after many of my friends got the Anova brand sous vide. I liked the price point of this one even more and I'm so glad I went with it. This one heats the water super quick, it's quiet and works perfectly. My food comes out cooked to perfection every time. The only thing I wish was different is the clip to hold it to the container. This one doesnt move much so I cant use it with my shorter stock pots like I could with some other models that have moveable retainers.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Hill

customer_reviews.title: temperature issues
customer_reviews.text: I got my first unit and the temperature was consistantly under by a full 45 degrees. The undercooked pork tenderloin had to be thrown away because it was basically sitting in a pot of lukewarm water for a couple hours. Luckily amazon replaced the unit even though it was past 30 days. I got the replacement unit and this one is consistently over by 12 degrees. At least being over by 12 degrees is safe so I kept the unit and simply subtract 12 degrees from my setting when I use it. Make sure you use a thermometer in the water to test the unit and compare against the units reading since undercooked meats can be dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: Bay Area Girl

customer_reviews.title: Failed on second use
customer_reviews.text: Loved the unit on the first use. Made the juiciest thick cut pork chops even better than brining the chops. Went to use yesterday to make a couple of New York strip steaks and the unit shut itself off during the initial heating of the water bath. Pressing the start button gave erratic results like switching from F to C with momentary button press. Verified water level between min and max. Tried different outlet. Finally no response from button press. Very disappointing. Not sure I would purchase anything from Chefman again.
customer_reviews.author: KeithG

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working ( Got quick replacement)
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after two uses. Great appliance when it works. Need replacement help. Update: They sent me a new replacement very quickly and this one works great. Thanks for the prompt service.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Paulsrud

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed and will probably return it to Amazon and purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: First time out of the box the unit worked for 5 minutes then shut off, everything was properly setup using a large rubbermaid container with the correct water levels, I suspect it's defective as well. I'm disappointed and will probably return it to Amazon and purchase the Anova instead. I just sent an email to Chefman, yet to hear from them it's Sunday so they are closed I'm guessing.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Holdridge

customer_reviews.title: SO easy to use...wonderful tool.
customer_reviews.text: There is no barbeque in the world that can make a rib eye taste as moist and juicy as this. The thicker the steak the better....not meant for thin cuts. I have also tried NY steaks, but the rib eyes are the bomb. I cook mine to around 137 degrees, because I like enough time on the grill or on an iron skillet to get a really good sear. You would still be safe with 139 degrees if you like your steaks medium rare like me...solid pink all the way through. Enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 5 minutes of use
customer_reviews.text: First five minutes in the water and I hear a noise. Thought it was loose clanking on the side of the pot, but no. The sous vide now sounded like the bearings going out, it then stopped. Turned it back on and in less than 20 seconds it stopped again. I found a share of black rubber in the bottom of the pot. Very disappointed, now I get to go through the return process. Do they not test these before boxing.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Works well until it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: Up until the moment this decided not to turn on anymore, it had been pretty great. Cooked the foods up to the temp I wanted and was very easy to use. Large temp display and temp wheel for setting the correct cooking temp made using it very easy. All was good until one day, it just decided it didn't want to turn on. Got about a year of nearly daily use out of it until it quit, not really interested in dropping $80 once a year on a sous vide cooker so on to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kidd

customer_reviews.title: This thing is junk!
customer_reviews.text: Many things wrong with this piece of junk. I've had it since the end of December 2018 and it has been very difficult to use from the beginning. Very difficult to turn it on and to get the temperature to register correctly - the touches on the screen do not want to work. Today it quit during the cooking cycle and will not respond to the touch screen at all. In the meantime, I have a roast in the thing that is about 1/4 finished in the cooking cycle. I love the sous vide cooking, but this thing does not speak well of it!
customer_reviews.author: Carole F.

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS IT!!! IDIOT PROOF RESTAURANT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: As someone who doesn't cook everyday, and who is busy, , highly highly recc this sous vide device. I use it with only a large Dutch oven and clip it to the side. Ziploc bags and cleaned heavy garden rocks. Use long salad tongs to maneuver the rocks onto the ziplock bags. Voila! This is the best. Reliable, easy to use. Recc a Brinkman 12 inch Cast iron skillet to brown your meat. Make sure you season the skillet beforehand and after.
customer_reviews.author: DRN

customer_reviews.title: BEST KITCHEN GADGET EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is practically the only tool you need for your kitchen!! I've used other sous vide before and this one is by far the best quality and value of any of them. Works quickly, has a clear display, and you can almost literally make ANYTHING with it- steak, chicken, fish, vegetables, eggs, it's seriously incredible. And such a good holiday gift for the foodie in your life, I'm buying them for everyone this year because I love it so much! You will not be sorry!!
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Temperature inconsistent and automatically cut off while cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Updated: A member from the Chefman team contacted me shortly after I wrote this review. They sent me a replacement unit and it works great! I have already made several batches of Sous Vide eggs (like Starbucks) that are AMAZING. Thank you so much to the wonderful customer service I will be a repeat customer! Used once successfully - tried to make chicken and not only did it say 180 degrees and was cooler than bath water you could easily put your hand in it but it turned off after about an hour. Would return but my return window is up. Very disappointed- I bought this brand because of the reviews and the company seemed to want their customers happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Restaurant Quality Food
customer_reviews.text: The best feature for the Chefman Sous Vide Precision Cooker is the chicken breast is absolutely the most delicious and moist that I have ever eaten. The Sirloin steak was made set for medium rare, and it came out restaurant perfect.....I love my Chefman Sous Vide Precision Cooker. I cannot find any feature about this item that I am unhappy with. It is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann Morris

customer_reviews.title: Broken from start and no customer support to assist.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work, new out of the box. Customer support was impossible to get in touch with. Not the first person to complain about these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to introduce to the sou vide ways!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect intro level sou vide. Easy to use. Wish we had this year’s ago. We are able to meal prep and not be so wasteful! I have a fear of cooking meat and chicken for others. This avoids overcooking/undercooking! Perfect protein every time! Only problems we run into might be more app related. The app sometimes doesn’t list the time. Or, doesn’t connect easily. We have to close the app, unplug, replug, then open the app. Other than that, and making sure we pay attention to the countdown timer working.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: Used it three times and it quit
customer_reviews.text: When the start (play) button is pressed it flashes PRE but then gives a beep and then nothing. Nothing on the internet suggests a fix. There apparently is no way to re-boot the device. Now i've got a tri-tip to cook by the old method.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie HH

customer_reviews.title: WIFI
customer_reviews.text: I can not get it to connect to my WIFI. I have several other WiFi products that have been very easy to setup. I am using 2.5 they admit that it will not work on 5. I my case it in unable to use WiFi at all...
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this device only lasted 26 months (approximately 25 uses.) Now all we get when we plug it in is a constant beep and the water will not circulate. it is not the water level - checked that.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Merten

customer_reviews.title: Sous Vide does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the item March 30,2018. The Sous Vide was never even taken out of the package as he was waiting to get the correct bags for the food and a pan. Only 2 weeks ago he finally decided to try it on some awesome steaks he purchased. How totally disappointing...the sous vide would not even stay on long enough to cook the product. So now months out I had no receipt as I trusted in the product and I have a sous vide that now turned out to be a horrible gift and does not work. What a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and was supper excited, preped all the food and was ready to cook.... Plugged in and nothing.. Machine was defective right out of the box. What a disappointment.. Purchased another brand for a little more but it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died quickly
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 1 month then died. Now it reads 148 all the time and doesn't heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kitchen appliance. Opened a whole new world of cooking for me. I love the fact that my steaks are so tender and easy to chew for me. Pork chops turned out well to. Have yet to try cooking a small meal with it. Looking forward to trying new recipes.
customer_reviews.author: bonbrad

customer_reviews.title: Temp is off by 10 degrees
customer_reviews.text: Using it for the first time and I thought i’d check to see how accurate my new thermometer was and it was off by 10 degrees. So I got out our other thermometer and it was close to the new one I just tested. So as of now I have to set the temperature 10 degrees off the desired temp. Will update after the steaks are done.
customer_reviews.author: eswart82

customer_reviews.title: Try it! You’ll like it!
customer_reviews.text: Tried it once. Results were great so I bought 3 more for my adult children. Seems well made. Temperature was accurate. If you havent tried sous vide, you are missing out!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Broken on second use
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product because of the good reviews. First one showed up obviously refurbished even though we bought new returned for a replacement used the replacement twice and the motor started making a very loud rattling clicking sound. Returning this one as well will not be ordering another one
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Awful Product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Used it three times and it broke. It stopped working or keeping temperature and started making a loud beeping sound before it turned off. Read all the tech support and this is a common problem. Total junk. Unfortunately it was after my return period on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Calilocal20

customer_reviews.title: Works well - didn't last
customer_reviews.text: We loved the Chefman Sous Vide for about a year. It worked great and food came out amazing. However, after only a year the product stopped working. It beeps that it's at temperature as soon as you plug it in and won't stop beeping. There is also very little troubleshooting in the manual it comes with or online. For the price of the appliance we expected it to last much longer. Tried cleaning it and several different temp settings. Nothing works it's just dead.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Bushey

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I've been looking into Sous Vide cooking ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I've been looking into Sous Vide cooking for over a year now reading reviews etc. I finally pulled the plug on this model and couldn't be happier with this purchase. We've used it everyday for over a month now. I just cooked the most delicious steak ever. If you are considering purchasing a sous vide, this is the BEST one! 1000% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Hirschhaut

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sous vide
customer_reviews.text: This works great. It’s very simple and straightforward and makes the best steaks. It doesn’t have Bluetooth, but why would you need it? You don’t have to be precise....you turn it on and then come back in one to two hours. I’d rather save the money.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Noisy!!! Yes!!! Precision? Yes.
customer_reviews.text: Basic just like I wanted. Very loud, not what I want. It actually sounds like it’s straining to keep the water circulating. Like a car downshifting. Poor little motor is having a noisy evening.
customer_reviews.author: sheckydog

customer_reviews.title: Easy use and delicious food
customer_reviews.text: My husband does the cooking but he really likes this and the food he's made with it is delicious. It seems very easy. He sets up a recipe and leaves it for a couple hours or up to half a day. Clean up is a breeze, as in almost nonexistent. You just have a pot of water.
customer_reviews.author: M. Selje

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great product, cook everything perfectly even. Sometime with make you feel like is to much work when is not and make you wonder if you rather put your meats in the grill like always. Otherwise, work perfect and give you and evenly cook meat like in any other place.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Marcano

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to cook perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This works like a charm. Easy to set up and use. I finally am able to cook meat and fish the exact way I like it. Just prepared a whole filet mignon for the family, they said it was the best they ever had!
customer_reviews.author: PCF

customer_reviews.title: Great item but questionable longevity
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but the clamp mechanism plastic is cracked and falling apart. Looks like stress inside the plastic the way it fractured. Only used it a few dozen times before this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: A great entry level Sous Vide unit for the occasional cook
customer_reviews.text: A great entry level Sous Vide unit for the occasional cook. I wish the clip was easier to remove as it did not fit very well onto the container I purchased it with, but it cooks meat perfectly every time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Should have believed the bad reviews.
customer_reviews.text: SHOULD HAVE BELIEVED THE BAD REVIEWS. I had used this just the second time to show off with neighbors and filets . . . AND IT DIED. EMBARRASING!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Mathes

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money...
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked great for about 3 times and then won't turn on anymore. It went defective within a few months. Controls and temperature knob feels cheap. Very dissatisfied with overall quality and life expectancy of this product.
customer_reviews.author: LV

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to file a warranty claim
customer_reviews.text: The product worked awesome until it stopped heating the water. We cleaned it thoroughly using vinegar as recommended and it still won't work. I went to the manufacturers website and filed a claim twice only to receive a message stating "an error occurred while processing your request" on both attempts. It's very frustrating and I'm hoping to receive some assistance with the process from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri H

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly amazing!!! The Chefman Sous Vide is definitely worth the hype in the cooking world. It is definitely extremely user-friendly, and one of my favorite kitchen gadgets that I have by far. It is very easy to use and more convenient than any others that I have tested out. I have never made a stress free and easy perfect steak, fish, and creme brulee until now. I highly recommend the Chefman Sous Vide to anyone in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Yael

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: First time user, it was easy to use and my food turned out amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I'm so angry about this purchase. It was working then it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy when I receive my machines. I've used it about 7 times since I've purchased and it just stopped working on me. my it just stopped working on me. I'm so sad it doesn't heat the water up anymore and the thermometer doesn't register the the Profit
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Wallace

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Cooks salmon great
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Cooks salmon great! Steaks pretty well to but stay close to the time tables provided in the book.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: JUST FOR YOUR  FYI
customer_reviews.text: Is sucked it is a piece of crap that doesn't work so buy it if you are a sucker it is a BIG HUG JOKE FOR COOKING
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The boy named sous!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple weeks ago, since it was considerably less than the Anova. It doesn’t have timers, Bluetooth, or wi-if, but it keeps the water at the set temp( I tested), and circulates the water fine. If you need the connectivity, get the more expensive one, but this does the job with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warehouse deal gone bad?
customer_reviews.text: Love the simplicity of this this. The two categories as far as I can tell are temp? And how long? There is a rolling touch dial to set all this. This kind of mechanism is awesome for someone like me. My issue is, once all this has been set in Fahrenheit and Centigrade, getting the Chefman to begin preheating and/ or cooking is not going well. Or at all. It begins as it should, then promptly shuts itself off :-(.
customer_reviews.author: Val Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: A little noisy but works well. On my first 48 hours sous vide cook. Fingers crossed. I have already cooked steaks and pork chops in it. Came out awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Used it less than a year, maybe less than 20 times. Time function stopped working and can't set the time anymore. The display flashes zeroes and the wheel doesn't do anything. Useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Bad product

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend everyone gets one! Everything you cook with this tastes incredible! There are TONS of recipes to use and its VERY easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool for sous vide cooking
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool for sous vide cooking, but I recommend getting a container with a lid to use with it to keep the temperature regulated. We have had better results when covering the cooking container.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Bansbach

customer_reviews.title: don't buy. Spend extra for a better one from a different company
customer_reviews.text: shuts off all the time. Takes an hour just to get it to run. The Bluetooth hasn't worked once. Customer support doesn't help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift so I'm not sure how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Alena034

customer_reviews.title: Love this Sous Vide
customer_reviews.text: I used it for stakes and corned beef. The results were great! It is very easy to handle and clean
customer_reviews.author: Malkiel

customer_reviews.title: Tastiest meats ever! Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This item had the nicest packaging ive ever seen. I must tell you this is incredible the meat that we made was so succulent and tasty. Im looking fwd to using this for many more dishes it was so simple and mess free. The idea of not having to clean up was great!! This is a must for any foodie!!
customer_reviews.author: yitz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing has worked flawlessly. It has opened up a whole new world of cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Reed

customer_reviews.title: This Sous Vide is fantastic. It is a little loud as the water ...
customer_reviews.text: This Sous Vide is fantastic. It is a little loud as the water starts to heat but then you hardly know it is on. I have to set the timer so I don't forget it is on.
customer_reviews.author: Sharer

customer_reviews.title: Ugh...
customer_reviews.text: This was the most disappointing wand. It just quit working after 1 hour. We could not get a response from the company, and found multiple reviews echoing the same experience.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this sous vide, does the job and is inexpensive
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work right
customer_reviews.text: It keeps shutting off on its own. Ruined a meal. Does not work as should. Has done this three of the four times I used it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to say except that I love this thing. I have made the best steaks I have ever made on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Disneyway

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific machine, pairs nicely with the large plastic tub that usually pops up on things other people bought. Easy to use, clean, and cook with.
customer_reviews.author: tom stilley

customer_reviews.title: It prevents evaporation and works great! The first thing we cooked was a roast ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! My husband modified a cooler by drilling a hole the size of the cooker. It prevents evaporation and works great! The first thing we cooked was a roast beef! Came out medium rare all the way through!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Berndt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was the droid.....I mean sous vide cooker I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason&Amanda Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: Did not work once. Would turn on but would give you the long beep error. Stared the return process for this. Will research and find a better sous vide
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item bad right out of box.
customer_reviews.text: Item broke right out of box , brand new , started making loud noise like bearings or circulating water pump issue. Such a shame quality control is so poor these days. Other reviewers had similar issue.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Not good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great first time. Wouldn’t heat up second time. Can’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It was everything I hoped it would be. Easy to use. Well made. Great!
customer_reviews.author: DahcBoul

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my daughter for Christmas and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loves it. She is very busy with work and school and this saves her time making meals.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Jobe

customer_reviews.title: Best steak I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Simple to use, accurate, and makes incredible steaks
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Only issue no power switch to turn off have to unplug it. Love it over other brands I have.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Harway

customer_reviews.title: Love my Chefman!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ive only used my Chefman so far for steaks. Each time they have come out so tender. It’s so easy to use also.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is truly amazing, some of the best cooked steaks we've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: stopped working after 1 use. had to return. so grateful for prime!
customer_reviews.author: goodknight

customer_reviews.title: Defective from the start. 😭 wasted my time and ruined my evening.
customer_reviews.text: Bought my meat, vacuum sealed everything, opened the Sous Vide, set everything up as directed and the thing ran for 3 seconds and shut off with a loud tone. Everything was set up correctly this isn’t my first Sous Vide rodeo. The chefman was defective right out of the box. Thank god amazon is great with the return policy because this product is a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Product does not heat water to temperature setting. Maybe 20 less at best. It seems to be getting worse.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Best product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I don't use my phone for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Just made the best steaks ever. No steak knife needed. Super easy!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: No worrying about overcooking.
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks great! It comes with a user manual to explain how to use it, plus you can go to youtube and find so many more videos with explanations. So far I have used the Chefman for boneless skinless chicken and it tastes amazing. Usually, I run the risk of overcooking and the chicken drying out, but this time it was perfect. No worrying about overcooking, so you could leave it and let it cook by itself, no checking, flipping, or cutting to see if the middle is done. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. H.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Sous Vide
customer_reviews.text: I got this Sous Vide after seeing a friend's and eating the chicken and steak that he cooked. I have used it at almost every dinner since and love it. My chicken and vegetables especially has never been so moist and delicious. With a sous vide it's almost impossible to burn or overcook, it makes cooking easy. I just downloaded the free app that is included with the Chefman and it has lots of recipes and cooking instructions. I have been very happy with this particular one and find that it works just as well as the more expensive one purchased by my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Stradling

customer_reviews.title: Unit crapped out and has faulty temperature readings after 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit crapped out and has faulty temperature readings after 6 weeks. It always says 178 degrees even in cold water, non functional
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Coleman

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product before I purchased it, but it works perfectly. It is very reliable. It is easy to use. I use it almost every day. It cooks meat better than any other cooking method that I am aware of. I believe that every kitchen should have one.
customer_reviews.author: FI Bill

customer_reviews.title: The first one showed up in good snappy time
customer_reviews.text: The first one showed up in good snappy time, but after about 20 minutes of use it became clear the device was *very* defective. I think I stopped it just short of causing a fire. Although it probably wasn't needed, I sent Chefman an email. Their reply was friendly and seemed sincere, but it was extremely delayed. The replacement has been working well, but it doesn't do anything more than a barely audible single beep one time when the timer completes. I end up having to use a different timer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lustfield

customer_reviews.title: Great steak!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new way of cooking. Best steak ever! I highly reccomend this if you're looking for a new kitchen gadget!
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer_Strong16

customer_reviews.title: Of the immersion circulators I own, this is the best value.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Excellent for beginners- I use it at work weekly to par cook eggs for brunch, heat up sauces for dinner. The only downside is that it's purely display operational; there are no app based operations here. Unlike the Joule or Anova, you're not using your phone at all. It's pretty powerful, heats up quickly, and can take a beating. More than one person on my staff has dropped it and it still works fine. I also own the Nomiko circulator and the Anova circulator, like I said this is the best value. If only it had bluetooth and app base operation, but for the price, I'll just do without.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Mike

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: This. Is. NOT. Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: So... it’s been 4 months and the temp is completely off. I’ve ruined about $200 worth at steak at this point. Cooking a beautiful 1 1/2-2” ribeye at 128 for 1 hour and it’s well done every time. Even BEFORE the reverse sear. Completely bummed as its past the return time for amazon. I absolutely LOVE this sous vide!! I’ve made some of the best steaks ever, cooked perfectly every time! Super easy to use with the app. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Hospo

customer_reviews.title: do NOT buy this thing
customer_reviews.text: first one came in doa used and returned by someone. second came in without a user manual. went to the chefman site (and many others) looking for a manual and found nada but sales crap. save yourself what I went through and buy something else
customer_reviews.author: John Myers

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I made this purchase and am enjoying the benefits ...
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I made this purchase and am enjoying the benefits of Sous Vide cooking. It is super easy to set the temperature, and the unit maintains the temperature perfectly. The large clip holds the unit securely to any pan or container. Start off with warm tap water and the unit heats up quickly - in minutes. So far, I have followed the easy recipes and eveything has been perfectly cooked - tender and moist!!! I will be looking for more recipes to try.
customer_reviews.author: melissa v

customer_reviews.title: Avoid. No real customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The first two times I use this product my steaks came out beautifully and it was wonderful. The third time I use this product it just beeped on and then beeped off over and over again at 4 p.m. on a Friday. the customer service line is advertised to be open until 5 p.m. but when I called in the pre-recorded voice said it was closed. Now I'm stuck with raw steaks. What kind of products stop working after three uses and do not have their advertised service time. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin R Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in order to Sous Vide some 30 day dry aged ribeyes that I’m about to cut from a primal... today however I cooked some garlic/herb chicken breasts. Wow. My pot is quite large and the 1000 watt heater made quick work of heating to 140F. Temp held perfect for about two hours, then removed to crisp the breasts a bit. AMAZING. I’ve never had chicken so tender and juicy... not stringy in the least. Sous Vide is not a fast method of cooking, it’s a precision method of cooking. I cannot wait to cook my ribeyes! Easy to use, excellent packaging, superb results.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Welniak

customer_reviews.title: If you are not concerned about precise temps
customer_reviews.text: It work, simple to use and set up. I just cannot rely on the machine to get to the temp I want it to. It tends to run about 10 degrees hotter than the setting says it is. So, always set it low and check the temp with another thermometer every hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stiemsma

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: When it works, this is pretty great. Unfortunately, mine stopped working after only a month and it took nearly three weeks for customer service to send me a replacement. While I did eventually get a replacement, the lack of support for the product makes me unable to recommend this otherwise decent device to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Wow-Za!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow-za!!! What a machine. This is an easy to use product--forget the frills!!! I am thrilled!! I do use distilled water, which I make, with all of my sous vide machines. This way, you don't have to worry about mineral deposits. Thank you Chefman for a quality product. I also love the Chefman balls that I purchased to decrease evaporation--of couse, I am using them with my new machine.
customer_reviews.author: Sledge

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase when cooking steak!
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time when making meat. It’s fool proof because you can set it and forget it. We usually set it around 135 for medium rare for about an hour and then just sear it when we are ready for dinner. It comes out perfectly pink. I’ve always had a hard time cooking meat to the prefect temp and this literally makes me look like a real chef!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Lim

customer_reviews.title: Early days but great so far
customer_reviews.text: Our 1st gadget on the sous vide bandwagon adventure. Looks and feels quality made... will update this review after more experimentation. Found a 12QT container (pic shown), plus separate lid to prevent condensation, plus a heavy rack to keep pouches separated.
customer_reviews.author: L. Massaar

customer_reviews.title: I have to share with people how good is this precision cooker
customer_reviews.text: I have to share with people how good is this precision cooker. I am not a good cooker, but this precision cooker saves my life and family. This cooker is very easy to use even though I have no idea when I open the box. All you need is the cooker, a pot, water, and your foods. I put every into the pot, and set the timer. I am surprise that the food tastes really good and less oily than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Almost DOA during first use....
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived almost DOA. We'll see how the next one works....
customer_reviews.author: A User

customer_reviews.title: not happy..
customer_reviews.text: First one didn't work, 2nd made to much noise... not happy.... returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Intriago

customer_reviews.title: this thing works fantastic..
customer_reviews.text: read the directions and you can't go wrong.......this thing works fantastic........and in JUST water.......I like to use a vacuum sealer.....day before you are going to cook whatever it is.....season and prepare the meat......little olive oil in the bag....so it doesn't stick.....and I use a little butter on my meat.....then seal it..let it sit..over night....next day......its an OMG moment after you sear it....I use the bar-b-g'er...enjoy...
customer_reviews.author: steve Heitsmith

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this sous vide cooker
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this sous vide cooker. It works very well. You have to be aware that it will take longer to cook sous vide...but hopefully you like the result so much (like we do) that you won't mind the extra time.
customer_reviews.author: Dal - S.F. Fan

product_meta.title: Chefman Sous Vide Immersion Circulator w/ Precise Temperature, Programmable Digital Touch Screen Display and Easy to Use Controls, Black
product_meta.description: Color:Manual Sous VideWHAT IS A SOUS VIDE? Simply put Sous Vide is an easy stress-free method of producing 5-star restaurant quality dishes using just a pot some water and food in a bag Chef man Sous Vide helps home chefs master underwater cooking with submerged circulation technology that precisely controls the water temperature ensuring meals from steak to fish and veggies to eggs never go above the perfect internal heat level and resulting in a succulently juicy evenly cooked dish that is to impress family & friends alike Long the domain of professional chefs and serious foodies Sous Vide is finally accessible to the everyday consumer with the Sous Vide by Chef man The master of underwater cooking Chef man Sous Vide's advanced even heating technology keeps water at the precise temperature needed for succulent Sous Vide results locking in juices flavor and preserving the nutritional quality of food with incomparable taste and texture Perfectly cooked steaks juicy chicken fall-off-the-bone ribs and vibrant veggies are just a few of the possibilities accessible with just the push of a button The Sous Vide is also known as Suvide Cooker or Suvid Machine for the French style of cooking For added convenience download the Chef man Sous Vide App (available for Apple & Android) Make consistently delicious food with our step-by-step guided recipes temperature guides how-to videos tips and more!
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL COOKING The Chefman Immersion Cooker makes it easy to create restaurant-quality dishes at home it’s high-quality PTC heating technology keeps water at the precise temperature needed for succulent Sous Vide results locking in juices flavor and preserving the nutritional quality of food with incomparable taste and texture

PERFECTLY DELICIOUS RESULTS You can now enjoy an easy cooking technique that cooks your food to perfection precisely cooked steaks juicy chicken fall-off-the-bone ribs perfectly poached eggs and vibrant veggies are just a few of the possibilities accessible with just the push of a button

VERSATILE & EASY TO USE This immersion circulator features a 360 directional pump and touch screen LCD display Built with smart sensors to monitor water level and a flexible clamp to fit most pots and containers Simply place your food in a food-grade sealed bag vacuum-sealed or ziplock Add seasonings or spices like herbs butter and garlic For extra flavor marinate food in fridge prior to sealing

RECIPE APP INCLUDED For added convenience download the Chefman Sous Vide App (available for Apple & Android) Make consistently delicious food with our step-by-step guided recipes temperature guides how-to videos tips and more!

RESOURCES cETL approved with advanced safety technology for long lasting durability & 1-year assurance provided by Chefman so you can purchase worry-free - we've got your back! For information on how to use your product scroll down for a PDF User Guide
